DOC.brief_title: A Study Withdrawal Effects With Dapoxetine Treatment Premature Ejaculation
DOC.detailed_description: Premature ejaculation ( PE ) form male sexual dysfunction . A measure withdrawal effect associate stop therapy PE Discontinuation-Emergent Signs Symptoms ( DESS ) , series question sign symptom experience patient . This study men PE multicenter , randomize , double-blind trial consist 3 phase : pre-randomization phase ( screen visit 1-week baseline period ) ; 10-week double-blind treatment phase patient receive dapoxetine placebo ; 2-week follow-up phase . The total duration study approximately 13 week . During double-blind phase patient receive study medication daily treatment use `` as-needed '' basis prior sexual activity . After 9 week , patient ( half active patient ) continue treatment dapoxetine ( another half active patient ) switch placebo last week therapy , abruptly stop study drug . Assessments effectiveness include incidence withdrawal symptom , assess change DESS ; control ejaculation , satisfaction sexual intercourse , severity symptom impression , base question ask specified interval study . Safety assessment include incidence , severity , type adverse event throughout study , well laboratory test questionnaire monitor sexual function specify time study.The study hypothesis abruptly stop treatment dapoxetine men PE result increase withdrawal symptom ( assessed DESS ) , compare men stay treatment . Oral tablet dapoxetine ( 60 milligram ) take daily also need 10 week treatment . No 1 tablet daily treatment 1 as-needed tablet within 24-hour period .
